title: Ticket #5906: Sub-DAGs confusing in condor_q batch mode output
description:
In condor_q batch mode output, sub-DAG jobs are counted in the TOTAL column but not the RUN column (I mean, the actual sub-DAG condor_dagman jobs, not the node jobs of the sub-DAG).

Things are already pretty complicated in terms of how we deal with DAG and non-DAG jobs -- I feel like we should treat top-level and sub-DAG jobs the same (e.g., not count the sub-DAG jobs in the TOTAL column).
creator: wenger
